subSections.title: Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=zài
|m_note=Colloquially often mispronounced ''zǎi'' in the Mainland - this is kept as standard in some words (e.g. {{zh-l|*下載}})
|c=zoi3
|h=pfs=chai/choi
|md=cái
|mn=chài
|mn-t=zai3
|w=2tse
|mc=3
|oc=2,3
|cat=v,n,cls,md:adv
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[ride]]; to [[travel]] (by); to [[take]]
# to [[carry]]; to [[hold]]; to be [[load]]ed with
#: {{zh-x|載{zài}人航天|human spaceflight}}
# to [[bear]] (the weight of); to [[support]]; to [[hold]] up
# to be [[charge]]d with
# to [[put]] into [[force]]; to come into [[effect]]
# to [[set out]]; to [[display]]
# to be in a [[certain]] [[condition]]
# to [[offer]] [[sacrifices]] to [[god]]s or [[ancestor]]s
# to [[begin]]; to [[start]]
# to [[decorate]]; to [[deck]] out
# {{lb|zh|in the form of {{lang|zh|載…載…}}}} {{n-g|Lists two simultaneous actions.}}
# [[as well as]]; [[also]]
# to be [[full]] of; to [[fill]] (the [[road]]); to be [[all]] over
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} {{zh-short|*下載|to [[download]]}}
#: {{zh-x|先 去 載 個 軟件。|'''Download''' the software first.}}
# [[vehicle]]; [[car]]; [[ship]]
# [[thing]]s [[load]]ed; [[load]]s
# [[affair]]; [[cause]]; [[undertaking]]
# {{zh-classifier|amount [[load]]ed by one [[chariot]]}}
# {{lb|zh|Min Dong}} [[would]] [[rather]]; [[rather]]
